body.name: Neutrogena Healthy Skin Face Moisturizer Lotion with SPF 15 Sunscreen & Alpha-Hydroxy Acid, Anti-Wrinkle Treatment with Vitamins C, E & B5, Oil-Free & Alcohol-Free, 2.5 fl. oz
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Saturday, February 17. Order within 11 hrs 46 mins
features: 2.5-fluid ounce bottle of Neutrogena Healthy Skin Face Lotion with SPF 15 Sunscreen, alpha-hydroxy acid and multi-vitamins improves the appearance of skin and protects against sun damage

Made with alpha hydroxy acid, an effective skin care ingredient to help reduce the appearance of fine lines, as well as Vitamin C, Vitamin E and Pro-Vitamin B5 to smooth dull, rough, damaged and uneven skin
Also contains Broad Spectrum SPF 15 to help protect skin against sun's damaging rays and improve the texture and appearance of skin
Facial moisturizing lotion leaves skin smoother and softer with improved radiance and clarity with clinically proven results in just 2 weeks
Dermatologist recommended, this anti-wrinkle treatment absorbs quickly and is allergy tested, oil-free and won't clog pores
body.description: Product Description Neutrogena Healthy Skin Face Lotion with SPF 15 Sunscreen reduces the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles and helps improve dull, rough, uneven skin to reveal a newer, younger-looking skin complexion. This facial moisturizing lotion is specially formulated with alpha-hydroxy acid, an effective skin care ingredient to reduce the appearance of fine lines, as well as vitamins C, E and Pro-Vitamin B5 to help improve the texture and appearance of your skin. It also contains Broad Spectrum SPF 15 to protect skin against sun's damaging rays. Dermatologist-recommended, this anti-wrinkle treatment is clinically proven to improve skin radiance and clarity for softer, smoother skin in just two weeks. The allergy-tested formula is oil-free, absorbs quickly, and won't clog pores. Brand Story By Neutrogena

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: At a Glance: Awarded the Good Housekeeping Seal of Approval Allergy tested Oil-free Non-comedogenic (won't clog pores) Non-greasy Healthy Skin Face Lotion with sunscreen SPF 15 Neutrogena Healthy Skin Face Lotion SPF 15 is a daily, multi-vitamin facial treatment that improves the texture and appearance of skin. The formula contains Alpha-Hydroxy Acid. It helps reduce the look of wrinkles and eases away the appearance of fine lines and discolorations for a more vibrant, even-toned complexion. Pro-Vitamin B5 moisturizes, softens, and smooths skin. SPF 15 sunscreen protects the skin from the sun’s burning rays.

How to Use In just weeks, you can have healthier, smoother skin with improved radiance and clarity. Apply daily after cleansing. Smooth a pearl-sized amount over your face and neck. May be used alone or with your favorite moisturizer. You may experience mild tingling or redness. This is normal and temporary.

About Neutrogena Neutrogena Corporation, a member of the Johnson & Johnson family of companies, is headquartered in Los Angeles, California. The dermatologist recommended skincare brand, Neutrogena offers some of the world's most loved beauty and skin care lines, and manufactures and markets products in over 70 countries.

The dermatologist recommended skincare brand, Neutrogena offers some of the world's most loved beauty and skin care lines, and manufactures and markets products in over 70 countries.

Anti-Aging Moisturizers For All Your Skin Needs Daily moisturizers that help hydrate to smooth skin and help reduce the signs of aging. Neutrogena Healthy Skin is a line of daily moisturizers that help to ease away the appearance of fine lines and discolorations for a lifetime of healthy, beautiful skin.

Healthy Skin Anti-Wrinkle Night Cream Diminishes the appearance of fine lines, wrinkles, and age spots. Healthy Skin Eye Cream Reduces the appearance of fine lines around the eye. Healthy Skin Anti-Wrinkle Cream with Sunscreen SPF 15 Reduces the appearance of fine lines, wrinkles and age spots. Healthy Skin Firming Cream Broad Spectrum SPF 15 Visibly improves elasticity and firmness for younger-looking skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Longtime user, love it!
reviews.reviewText: I have been using this moisturizer for over 20 years. When I have tried other things, my skin is relieved to get back to this one! Visible difference! Smooths, moisturizes, brightens and protects. I’m nearly out of it and it’s not available any more. Scrambling to find a replacement that is as good. Help!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is an excellent product. It has SPF 15 and is a nice moisturizer for your face.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been using this moisturizer for more than 20 years! It keeps my skin soft and dewy. The radiance is so natural but very noticeable, people always ask me what moisturizer I use that makes my skin so glowy! When I realized stores were starting to not carry it I would buy 2/3 at a time. It was always $10 to $12.But now at $32 I’m finding it hard to keep buying, annnd I think they have lessoned the main ingredients. It’s still good but the radiance is much less! I’m now in my late 60s and still wrinkle free! I garden so I get lots of sun, this cream has a great sunblock! But for $32 I’m finding it more a luxury than a daily cream! But I will continue to use it because it’s just that good!Update:But whooo it’s $60 now!! Unbelievable! I think me and this moisturizer have to break up!!! It’s good but not that good!! 😳🤷🏽‍♀️

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Please don’t discontinue your Alpha Hydroxy skin lotion
reviews.reviewText: I calledNeutrogena about this product and was told they discontinued it. I am very upset with that decision. The Alpha hydroxy plus the sunscreen was the perfect combination. It used to be $10 and now it is $60 probably because we can’t get it anymore. They need to bring this back as I am now 70 and have no wrinkles after 20 yrs of using this product. Who made that decision anyway? 😟😟😟

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Hydrates just enough moisture
reviews.reviewText: Nice face product & no break-outs & fragrance

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product, just to Expensive
reviews.reviewText: I am a Black woman in my 70s ,I have used this product for years, when I could buy it for 9.99. I have always gotten compliments on my skin.It is truly excellent product. I saw the price today on AMAZON IS 60.00.The price is just to high. I will have to wait until I find it on sale. I really don't want to use any thing else.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Neutrogena Healthy Skin face lotion with sunscreen is an excellent product. Love it! WHY was it discontinued?? Price now for vendors selling it is over the top !!! Just bought one for $66.14 ! Last one I'll buy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 3, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I've been using this for years!
reviews.reviewText: I have been using this product for YEARS! I recently switched to another brand (more expensive) and my skin started getting getting spots!! THIS PRODUCT PREVENTS SUN SPOTS Y'ALL! It works. I don't know what I would do if they discontinued it. It's amazing, affordable, and keeps the spots of age away. It's age defying. Please note - this stuff burns, but that's how you know it's working. Good Glycolic acid always burns. Also, it's heavily scented, but even if this product smelled like cat piss i'd still use it because it keeps me looking young. I'm 40, but look 30 because of this product.

reviews.reviewTitle: No recomiendo si tienes cutis graso
reviews.reviewText: No me gustó que me deja la cara muy grasosa y que no tiene olor agradable.
Didn’t do wonders to my skin. Considering the price, I was expecting smuch more effective results.
Créme excellent que j'ai connu suite à un voyage à l'étranger. Je suis trés satisfaite, elle protége bien, pas grasse,

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on July 4, 2012
reviews.reviewText: I'm a bit of a skin care junkie, so I've tried many, many day time moisturizers. Before I moved to the UK a year ago, though, I had finally decided that this was the best I had ever used. When I couldn't find it in stores here (UK; don't know why my profile says I'm still in Corpus), I tried using other moisturizers. I saw the error of my ways, and decided to just pay the little bit extra that it costs here (it's only $10 in the States), and order it from Amazon. I'm definitely happy with that decision. Why do I love it?The lotion delivers the perfect amount of moisture for the day. It doesn't leave my skin feeling sticky at all. It feels nice; hydrated and SOFT! I've never broken out while using this lotion, AND it does seem to smooth (or at least plump out) wrinkles. Also, one bottle seems to last me about four or five months. Finally, you gotta love that it has SPF.It's an all-around great moisturizer, and I really can't recommend it enough.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on June 24, 2019
reviews.reviewText: I can’t express how much I love this product and I don’t usually write reviews. I have combination skin, this is not too greasy neither does it dry my skin. I have spent literally years trying to find something that works like this. Everything else I’ve tried automatically brings out white heads on my face but not this.I have used this product for the last couple of years, ordering online because it’s not available where I live, and the price is great.
